title: THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Consultant Post
description: The Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for a Consultant - Quality Assurance Position. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, BHMS, BAMS, BVSc, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible ...
